story: Great Job on that archive!

This archive has some errors.
We believe six kindred have been swapped

Unfortunately I can't be more specific.
The swaps could be in any bloodline
Nice work!
Fantastic!

The Council has asked me to convey
their most sanguine gratitude

with that out of the way
let's move on
I have good news and bad news

The archive spins more efficiently
when it has fewer errors

Your efforts have yielded some...
expected results
You'll see what I mean...

The side effects of your work are
so energetic!
I wonder if any of us remembers	he archive behaving this way

It is, of course, the nature of
errors to propagate over time
Mmmm. Still spinning

I suppose the pursuit of logic is worth
some chaos
The archive seems to be really flying now

I'm not sure how your investigation
will affect it
Something seems to have shifted
The rules have changed again
I think I'm getting seasick
That was a joke
Only mortals can vomit
Getting close to the end
This is the final archive!
